plot.description: Plot object to annotate with x-axis

at.description: A numeric vector of x-value locations for tick marks

label.description: A logical value indicating whether to draw the labels onthe tick marks, or an expression or character vector which specifythe labels to use.If not logical, must be the same length as the \code{at} argument

scipen.description: An integer indicating the penalty to be applied whendeciding to print numeric values in fixed or exponential notation.Default value is \code{scipen = 999}

axisLine.description: A logical value indicating whether to show the axis line.Default value is \code{axisLine = FALSE}

params.description: An optional \link[plotgardener]{pgParams} objectcontaining relevant function parameters
